title: N162 SGC 60 Mike King Kelley SOLD
author: zljones

posts.post_title: N162 SGC 60 Mike King Kelley SOLD
posts.post_content: Well it came to that point in time, I need to sell this baby.  Asking SOLD for it which includes shipping.  I have pics here from before and after grading it.  It currently in the SGC holder. SALE PENDING
Woah sweet card! Didn't you pick that up raw on eBay? If so great score.. best of luck with the sale.

[quote name="itjclarke" post=1115364]Woah sweet card! Didn't you pick that up raw on eBay? If so great score.. best of luck with the sale.[/QUOTE]

Yup I got that one raw, I hate to see him go but my luck has not changed in life, hope he finds a good home.

[quote name="zljones" post=1115442]Yup I got that one raw, I hate to see him go but my luck has not changed in life, hope he finds a good home.[/QUOTE]

Sorry to hear about the life luck, but that Kelly was a great get by you.. if I remember correctly it was from England right?  Glad it paid off for you, especially since it took guts to pull the trigger on it raw.

[quote name="itjclarke" post=1116388]Sorry to hear about the life luck, but that Kelly was a great get by you.. if I remember correctly it was from England right?  Glad it paid off for you, especially since it took guts to pull the trigger on it raw.[/QUOTE]

Yea it was definalty my best score ever.  Lucklily I finally found a job but it pays less than before but there is a future at least, but thanks to the wonderful vehicle emissions they failed my truck big and need to pay at least $450 to fix it, long story short can't afford the repairs so I have to sell my cards to get a new car, the truck is on it's last leg anyway, and I can not afford to finance a car, so this card will get me something good plus the sales of my others.  It will be good to have a reliable car until I truly get back on my feet.
